useWin32DocsLookup.description: Whether to download Win32 API documentation from Microsoft when available.

useWebSearch.description: Enable web search for additional documentation using the configured LLM provider.

llmProvider.description: Name of the LLM provider to use (e.g., 'openai', 'anthropic').

llmVersion.description: Model or version identifier for the LLM provider.

maxDataSizeBytes.description: Maximum number of bytes to read from the target function during decompilation.

maxLlmCodeLength.description: Maximum length of code sent to the LLM; longer code is truncated.

docTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for downloading or searching documentation.

docFragmentSize.description: Size in characters of documentation fragments evaluated by the LLM.

docSearchMaxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to fetch during documentation search.

llmMaxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens that the LLM may generate in a single response.

maxForwarderHops.description: Maximum number of forwarded export hops followed when resolving a function.
